class KoXmlNode

Detailed Description

KoXmlDocument represents an XML document, structured in a DOM tree.

KoXmlDocument is designed to be memory efficient. Unlike QDomDocument from Qt's XML module, KoXmlDocument does not store all nodes in the DOM tree. Some nodes will be loaded and parsed on-demand only.

KoXmlDocument is read-only, you can not modify its content.

Author:
Ariya Hidayat <ariya@kde.org>
